title: QSS
body:
Sooo the qss nerfs are coming out soon and well there needs to be new items to build it into like one time in lck the shoutcasters said in a maokia top vs trundle support that the maokia is stuck with an akward item mercurial scimitar at late game, and he can't get rid of it else the trundle will be 100% unkillable.
This made me think that there needs to be a qss item for each role. one for adc's (merc) one for ap mages (makes different build paths than the aura item and zhonyas) and one for pure tanks (because really it sounds odd having a maokia/rammus being forced into getting 65 attack damage and 10% life steal along with the actul part they need out of the item: the mr and active)
This Qss thing needs to happen, qss buildpaths shouldn't just be limited to only 1 role

replies.body:
Lets just make everyone a get out of jail free card against strategy champs so those champions are completely unplayed again shall we?

Good bye to the champs that rely on lockdown/cc to have any useful contribution...

I guess it won't always happen in normals, but your idea would kill ranked play for a good pool of champs. 

Trundle is a strategy champ, and QSS vs him? For.. his wall? That you'll likely land in the slow again? The damage? Hate to say it, but its the old  Rock Paper Sciccors point of view, some champs have it over others, whilst they struggle against other champs and outright get dominate by some also.

So Trundle shouldn't be killable by Maokai unless Mao has had a great game with farm, kills and is snowballing and trundle has been kept down, but late game even farm, considering the rock paper sciccors thing again. Unless you dedicate every item to dropping Trundle. Don't expect Maokai to stop him solo without help from your team.

It's like people forget Moba's are a team game, there's not supposed to glory in every moment for every champion. That's what your team is for, to make up for the things you cannot do, as you provide them with things they do not have.

Very well said. I seem to find so many people forget this.

Especially playing norms. When you know you're laning against a counter, and you outright cant do anything but sit under your tower.. then get flamed for making no 'contribution' to the game because you have no kills.

There seems to be a stigma around where League is a 'Team Deathmatch' and the only thing that matters to win the game is kills, and being solo top (for example) means you're on your own.. You don't need any help.

well sucks to be you. QSS is getting nerfed so things like trundle ult, zed death mark and i think fiora ult, all dont get removed with QSS. see to you, you dont wanna play trundle, since hes now strong, so you complain about trundle. but your opinion is bias, because you say there is a singular problem, the problem is specifically one thing, QSS, and you want THAT to have a better effect on the game, by having a better reason to buy it and keep it for the late game, i.e. more build paths. you're saying this 1 ultimate change is "needed" and you'll assume it is the best possible course of action for riot and their game

how bout you go into about 4000-5000 words explaining how you plan to balance every single other newly arisen unbalanced champion/abilities/combinations/interactions about the impact of the different QSS path/s on the game, just because of 1 champion having QSS being built against him for 1 ability? do you think you can manage this or is spelling maokai correctly, twice, too much to ask of someone anyway?
